plot: A woman can make a man do some strange things. He'll move Heaven and Earth to possess her, then risk life and limb to keep her. It's the weakness of the heart, that causes a man, to forsake his own senses and become something of a beast.
title: A Different Kind of Evil
plot_es: A woman can make a man do some strange things. He'll move Heaven and Earth to possess her, then risk life and limb to keep her. It's the weakness of the heart, that causes a man, to forsake his own senses and become something of a beast.
plot_en: A woman can make a man do some strange things. He'll move Heaven and Earth to possess her, then risk life and limb to keep her. It's the weakness of the heart, that causes a man, to forsake his own senses and become something of a beast.
